General.Name: Glarner Kantonalbank
General.Description: Glarner Kantonalbank provides various banking products and services for private and corporate customers primarily in the Canton of Glarus and neighboring economic area. It offers savings, service, and pension accounts; personal loans, mortgage solutions, and home finance; investment and asset management; debit and credit cards; and term and life insurance, and pension products. The company also provides pension and retirement advisory, and online banking services. It operates through branches, credit factory, as well as ATMs. The company was founded in 1884 and is headquartered in Glarus, Switzerland.
